settings.subheading: We know you’ll love our products! But if you are not fully satisfied for any reason, simply return the items for an exchange or a full refund within 60 days of purchase.

settings.toptitle1: "A Revolutionary Way Of Adding A Striking Carbon Fiber Contrast"
settings.title_info:
• 100% genuine carbon fiber
  • Trusted by the industries most reputable builds
  • Long lasting
  • Will never fade, oxidize, or loose its glossiness
  • Precision laser-cut fitment
  • Quality first

settings.title: Resin Rubber
settings.subheading: Top coat to protect your overlay from fading, oxidizing or decompozing.

settings.title: Carbon Fibre
settings.subheading: High-quality 2x2 twill weave carbon fiber sheet.

settings.title: Double-side tape
settings.subheading: Already attached double-sided tape for a quick and easy installation.

settings.title: Easy to Install
settings.subheading: No more broken clips due to installation Simply Peel, Align and Stick
settings.subheadinginfo: *We recommend cleaning the surface of your part prior to installing.

settings.title: Trusted by the industry's leading car builds
settings.title_info:
Instantly differentiate your build's interior and win over crowds at your favorite car meets!

Dyna Performance’s products have been tested and approved by the industry's most prestigious car builds.

settings.title: Airbags
settings.subheading: All steering wheels don't include airbags. Reuse your current steering wheel's airbag.

settings.title: Refund
settings.subheading:
Due to the fact that steering wheels are 100% custom made to specific customer requirements, steering wheels are not eligible for our 30-Day Full Money-Back Guarantee.

You may return your purchase within 15 days after receiving the item. To be eligible for a return, the steering wheel must be unused and display no wear and tear in the original packaging.

You will be refunded the total amount of your steering wheel purchase minus a 50% restocking fee that excludes shipping and handling.

settings.title: Shipping and Delivery
settings.subheading:
Steering wheel production time is generally 4-6 weeks.

Please note that in some rare occasions, shipping custom clearance is necessary. Dyna Performance is not responsible for any custom clearance and any custom fees associated to the shipment.

If custom clearance is necessary for your order, please contact us and we will get you in touch with one of our specialists to help you clear your package asap.

settings.title:
A Whole New
Driving Experience
settings.title_info:
• *Hand made*
  • Race inspired design.
  • Steering wheel flat bottom for a racing look and better leg room.
  • Utilization of only the finest quality materials on the market.
  • Thicker feel. Better control.
  • Top quality leather/alcantara and carbon fiber
  • No need to send us your wheel.
  • Attention to detail.

settings.subheading1:
Why have a standard steering wheel, when you can have a unique, one-of-a-kind design that looks and feels that way you want.

Regardless of the colour, material, or shape you may have in mind, if you can visualize it, we can make it!

settings.subheading2:
At Dyna Performance, we don't cut corners and pride ourselves on the extremely high standards when it comes to the quality of our products and materials.

We enable you to buy with confidence and trust.

settings.title: Dynamic LED Display
settings.subheading:
OBD2 Module provided. 

                                                 
               
Vehicle information will be transferred wirelessly via Bluetooth connection.
settings.subheadingbottom: More than 14 functions to help you drive better
settings.information:
Remark
  • 1. RPM setting from 1K to 9.9 K to get all lights flashing
  • 2. Many models have angle sensor to show angle data
  • 3. Unit data could be setted to be fit for your country
  • 4. Many more functions, please contact our sales team

settings.title: Designed To Keep Key Fobs Safe In Style

settings.image_heading: Every single one of our covers goes through extreme high standard precision factory quality checks to ensure quality control of every single case.
settings.title: Protect your Car keys
settings.subheading:
• Guaranteed to fit your car key slot
  • Will NOT Interfere with Keyless Signals
  • Perfectly tailored snug key fitment
  • Made of premium grain leather
  • Full anti-scratch key fob coverage protection
  • Equipped with a metal snap hook for pants attachment
